ygData.subject: Re: Proc'ing--OT from Gold Platted Crappy Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: How long are your fights?  Over a 45 second fight I will almost guarantee that you are not AVERAGING more than 2 procs a fight.  Probably, right around 1.5
ygData.messageBody:
How long are your fights? Over a 45 second fight I
will almost guarantee that you are not AVERAGING more
than 2 procs a fight. Probably, right around 1.5
procs. Run your logs through a parser and I'll bet
you will be shocked. I'm not saying that you can't
regularly proc 3 or 4 times in a fight. However, it
will be averaged with those times where you don't proc
at all in a fight.

I used a Staff of Writhing and Obsidian Shard to test
and had my dex bumped to 159--part of the time I even
had it around 173. Guess what. We fought lancerfish
in kedge. The fights lasted 45-60 seconds. I
AVERAGED less than 2 procs a fight. Granted I charmed
in a couple of fights. However, I proced nowhere near
the 4 or 5 times a fight that I felt like I was doing.

Again, I'm not saying that you aren't sometimes
getting 3 or 4 procs a fight. I get 3 to 4 procs a
fight fairly often myself. All I am saying is that
you are probably not AVERAGING 3 to 4 a fight. Run
your log through EQParse and I'll bet you are
surprised.

Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)
37th level bard

> Message: 8
> Date: Fri, 10 Mar 2000 18:11:04 -0500
> From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
> Subject: Re: Re: Gold Platted Crappy Weapon
>
> Umm I hate to break this to you, Thex, but I use two
> proc'ing weapons and
> they _routinely_ fire off 3-4 times a fight and
> sometimes several more. I
> had one fight where my ugly stick proc'd 7 times in
> a row (esp primary hand)
> Then again my un-buffed dex is 150.
>
> Who needs AC anyway? I'm not a tank!
>
> Lyrnia Jongleur
> Bard of Norrath
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Eric Boller" <eboller@...>
> To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, March 10, 2000 10:37 AM
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Gold Platted Crappy Weapon
>
>
> > From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
> >
> > Who cares about the proc? Most weapons don't
> average
> > more than 1 proc every 45 seconds or so anyway
> > (contrary to most people's belief that they
> average 4
> > or 5 procs per fight). The damage/delay is better
> > than the ykesha and ebw (not taking into account
> magic
> > numbers and lower delay,etc). I guess I still
> don't
> > see why you guys think it is crappy. Granted it
> is
> > off a dragon and is only marginally better than
> your
> > ykesh or ebw. However, unless you have a planar
> > weapon I would consider this better. Anyway,
> anyone
> > on Tunare who think this weapon is crappy--I will
> > gladly take your crappy weapon!
> >
> > Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)
> > 37th level bard
